subject: [Radiance-general] trouble 'Rendering with Radiance'!
body:
Sean,

If you're interested in borrowing the book for part of the year,
I can send you my copy. I admit that I don't use it much anymore,
but I'd still like to hang on to it long-term. Maybe we can
institute a "RWR-loaner" program. You'd just send it out to the
next deserving person. Kind of like Bookmooch, but for just this
one book, and revolving.

How does that sound?

Mark

On Tue, 22 May 2007, Mooney, Sean wrote:
